solution_line_template: John runs at {speed_with_dog} miles per hour for {duration_with_dog} hours, for a distance of {speed_with_dog}*{duration_with_dog}=<<{speed_with_dog}*{duration_with_dog}={distance_with_dog}>>{distance_with_dog} miles.
Then John runs at {speed_alone} miles per hour for {duration_alone} hours, for a distance of {speed_alone}*{duration_alone}=<<{speed_alone}*{duration_alone}={distance_alone}>>{distance_alone} miles.
